Blade Supermarket

Our blades meet the tightest of tolerances required by high end, heavy duty CNC machine tools.

Hydraulic Attachment Services provides a large selection of ready-made and bespoke shear blades manufactured to the highest standards. We source all our own raw materials and use state of the art CNC machines to guarantee exceptional quality.

All heat treatment is completed in house and we complete the final grinding process of the blades for a superior finish. We do not need to send blades to be completed anywhere else â€“ reducing time and saving money.

Completed blades ready for customer collection or shipping worldwide.
